meanings.definition: A tight-fitting one-piece garment covering the torso and legs, typically worn by dancers or gymnasts.
meanings.sent1: The dancers wore colorful unitards during their performance.
meanings.sent2: Gymnasts often choose unitards for their routines due to their flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The unitards made the dancers look like graceful superheroes on stage.
meanings.sent4: Her unitard was a second skin, accentuating every movement she made.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering unitards sparkled under the stage lights, mesmerizing the audience.
